topics.name: Shadows & Light
topics.description: Learn how shadows form and change with light!
learningObjectives: Understand that shadows are made when light is blocked
Predict shadow size based on light distance
Identify different light sources

topics.name: Push & Pull Forces
topics.description: Explore how things move with pushing and pulling!
learningObjectives: Understand the difference between push and pull
Identify forces in everyday activities
Predict how objects move with different forces

topics.name: Solids vs Liquids
topics.description: Discover the difference between solids and liquids!
learningObjectives: Identify solids and liquids in everyday life
Understand properties of solids (keep shape)
Understand properties of liquids (flow and take shape)

topics.name: Materials Around Us
topics.description: Explore different materials like wood, metal, and plastic!
learningObjectives: Identify common materials (wood, metal, plastic, glass)
Understand material properties (hard/soft, rough/smooth)
Match materials to their uses

topics.name: Number Bonds to 10
learningObjectives: Recognize number pairs that sum to 10
Use number bonds for quick mental math
Apply number bonds to solve simple problems

topics.name: Simple Addition
topics.description: Learn to add numbers up to 20!
learningObjectives: Add single-digit numbers
Understand addition as combining quantities
Solve simple word problems with addition

topics.name: Plants & Growth
topics.description: Discover how plants grow and what they need!
learningObjectives: Identify parts of a plant (roots, stem, leaves, flower)
Understand what plants need to grow (water, light, air)
Observe plant life cycles

topics.name: Seasons
topics.description: Explore the four seasons and weather patterns!
learningObjectives: Identify the four seasons (spring, summer, fall, winter)
Recognize weather patterns in each season
Understand how seasons affect nature
